name: Pyrite Farm
description:
GameDev.tv Game Jam 2021 Submission

This was our first game jam. Had a great time. Did not get as far as we had hoped, however, we feel like this project was generally a success, however sloppy it may be. 

Credits to http://quaternius.com/ and http://syntystudios.com/ for the free assets used for this project. 

All sounds used in this game were recorded locally :) No cows were harmed in the making of this game.
